DataElement.preferredName: Positron Emission Tomography Primary Neoplasm Uptake Result Anatomic Site Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the anatomic site related to the outcome of positron emission tomography using a semi-quantitative assessment for image uptake for the primary site of a tumor or cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Positron Emission Tomography Primary Neoplasm Uptake Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to outcome of positron emission tomography using a semi-quantitative assessment for image uptake for the primary site of tumor or cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A noninvasive imaging method that provides information about cellular activity (metabolic information).  It is used along with magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) which provides information about the shape and size of the tumor (spatial information).:The original tumor.

Concepts.definition: A technique for measuring the gamma radiation produced by collisions of electrons and positrons (anti-electrons) within living tissue. In positron emission tomography (PET), a subject is given a dose of a positron-emitting radionuclide attached to a metabolically active substance (for example, 2-fluoro-2-deoxy-D-glucose (FDG), which is similar to a naturally occurring sugar, glucose, with the addition of a radioactive fluorine atom). When living tissue containing the positron emitter is bombarded by electrons, gamma radiation produced by collisions of electrons and positrons is detected by a scanner, revealing in fine detail the tissue location of the metabolically-active substance administered.
A tumor at the original site of origin.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the other specified free-text field related to an anatomic site.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
